website_summaries.verdict: Soft squishy blocks in a lot of colors with shapes, animals, and textures to help toddlers learn.
pros: Comes with its own carry case to keep the set together
Won't hurt if they are thrown at you
cons: The blocks need to be surfaced washed
They may take on water if submerged

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but are they BPA free?
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the looks of the blocks. Nice packaging, but I'm still going to sterilize these before my daughter plays with them. The bag was completely sealed with a zip tie around the zipper so you can't open unless you cut it. I'm not really seeing anything that says bpa free though. It just says meets or exceeds all EN, canadian, and U.S. safety standards. Not sure if this should be a red flag or not. Hopefully someone will reply to this and let me know. Other then that it's a very well made product for a 6+ month old.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are adorable and my baby loves them, but I discovered imperfections on some the blocks (skid mark-ish) as well as black dirt (possibly mold?) on some of the blocks (Yuck!)...and they're supposed to be brand new! Just make sure that you give these blocks a good scrubbing and disinfecting before giving them to your child. There is also a piece of cardboard in the middle taking up room where 2 blocks would have fit perfectly. Would it have been so hard to add the extra blocks that the case was obviously meant to carry?
customer_reviews.author: An Avid ReaderTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: A couple of blocks have mold on them after just a few weeks of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: These blocks can’t be washed under water. Water will get into the holes and it won’t come out entirely. Not sure if the makers thought about this. I clean and sterilize all of my baby’s toys before giving it to her. These blocks are basically useless and will be thrown out in a week because we all know what happens to trapped water.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: PEDOPHILE SYMBOLS!!
customer_reviews.text: PEDOPHILE SYMBOLS all over these toys!! Please DON'T BUY THESE for your kids. BOYCOTT this company. Im throwing these away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Is that mold?! Yup it is... Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I loved these blocks... They were perfect for my 7 month old to nock around, teethe on and made fun noises to keep him entertained. However, my husband noticed on one of the lighter blocks a strange discoloration. So I cut the block open and it was covered in slimy mold on the inside. Each of the blocks has a small little hole so when you wash them they can get water inside or even saliva when baby teethes on them. I tossed all of them immediately. Gross!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey DM

customer_reviews.title: Well loved by 3yo and 13mo
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the baby toys that is still around my playroom. I tend to take a lot of stuff to the consignment shop, but this set of blocks has been spared several times. my daughter got them when she was around 9 months old. She liked to bite and throw them, but later ignored them altogether until her little brother came along. my kids are now almost 3 and 13m and they both love to play with these. My daughter now builds things with them and uses them with her little dolls and figurines and now it's my son chewing and throwing them around :)
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Stains can't be cleaned off
customer_reviews.text: My family has had these for over 3 years and they have gone through 2 children. They were kept in a stained wooden bin, ignored for the most part for a number of months in a temperate, dry climate. Something about this plastic reacted with the wood stain of the bin. The stain transferred to the blocks and is impossible clean off. Now we have blocks with wood stains and bins with unstained squares where the blocks were sitting. None of the other plastic toys that were kept in these same bins did this--only these blocks. Recommend keeping them in the packaging or another plastic container for storage.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: His favorite thing to do currently is knocking down towers we ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves these blocks! We got them as a present for his first birthday. His favorite thing to do currently is knocking down towers we build for him made out of these, and he also loves throwing them lightly (which of course would be painful with wood blocks - these are light and soft which makes them perfect for more active play.) The squeaky noise they make is also great because our son bangs the blocks together with great delight! He also enjoys the textures of the different designs on the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Val Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor. Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Very strong odor when open the package. I put them in the air for almost a week and the odor still there. Cannot imagine this is designed for babies. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby toy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these at 5 months old he began picking them up and now he squeezes them and throws them and crawls to pick them up. My favorite toy so far! They are much better than any wooden or plastic toy your baby will never get hurt with these and the colors are so vibrant good for sensory! I purchased multiple other toys from this brand after receiving these because they are the best baby toys around! Definitely check out the rest of the toy line. I've purchased as baby shower gift and recommend to any one with a baby of either gender!
customer_reviews.author: Biabell

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open these because they are for Christmas for my daughter. I like that the package is zip tied to where you have to cut it open. Buying toys that she will chew on is a little scary and I can tell these are new. I squeezed them through the package and they make a squeak noise. They are very soft which is great because everything ends up in her mouth. Great size for chewing so this is safe enough to let her play with, without worrying about choking. I also love the bright colors and the textures. I know she will love this.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old son instantly wanted to play with these. Of course he stuck them in his mouth, so Im really glad they aren't made of wood, and are easy to clean and gentle on his mouth. Also i feel like they are safer to play with because sometimes he falls on them while playing, and there are no sharp corners that could hurt him. They squeak if you squeeze them and it makes him giggle. Color order from 1-10! Great little details on every side. Im going to recommend these blocks to all my new mom friends. Best choice! Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian86

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as shown, so I hope you like orange
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like these. I wanted wooden blocks, but I couldn’t find any that seemed like good quality in a reasonable price range. These don’t have a strong smell, and the quality is good. My kid loves chewing on them and destroying everything I build. My only complaint is the color combo. There are 3 orange blocks in different shades, 2 blues in different shades, a red, a pink, 2 purples, and a yellow. I was hoping to use these to teach colors, but there’s no green despite the picture! They also have numbers (luckily 1-10 as expected), and some animal pictures that are cute but not useful for my 1 year old’s learning yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kerst

customer_reviews.title: Beware not safe
customer_reviews.text: This product came coated in a wired liquid. I think it was a perfume or essential oils, but am unsure. I now have to throw it out since the bag it comes in is cloth and the liquid got on the blocks. BEWARE before you buy I did not notice this when I gave it to my son to play with. Fortunately I realized it rather quickly, but for a foreign chemical to be on a kids toy rated for teething is unacceptable. If anything happens to my son I am suing this company for damages.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first block set for baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect first block set for baby. My 6 month old loves them. I feel comfortable with her chewing on them without harming herself or the block. These blocks have cute animal designs and a large number on each block. The number of animals matches that blocks number--- for example, 6 would have 6 cats on it. The blocks also squeak! They are easy to wipe down to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AJE16Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves her blocks!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are adorable! I can't say enough good things about them. Blocks are great quality and come in a very nice zippered storage bag. They are colorful, soft and squeezable, and squeak when they are squeezed. My granddaughter is 19 mos. old and enjoys stacking the blocks and putting them in various containers and taking them back out. As she gets older, the blocks will help her with counting and numbers. She won't outgrow them for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My son was 6 months old at the time of purchase and these blocks are perfect for him. They are easy for him to pick up and easy on the gums. At 8 months, he is very likely to be found with a block in his hand (or mouth). I love that they are BPA and phthalates free, have numbers, shapes, animals, and textures on them, and come with a reusable storage bag. I am looking forward to building many memories using these blocks and recommend them to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these blocks! AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Great, high quality, "first blocks"...but good for years of play time! They're soft rubber so they can safely be given to young babies...and they're great to teethe on! The soft rubber design makes them ideal for little ones in the "throw and drop" phase of play! They squeak if you squeeze them like rubber duckies and each block is adorable with numbers and animals and shapes. They come in a cute fabric carrying case and are indestructible. LOVE THIS TOY! My son got them at 7 months and he's even more in love with them today at 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: White Elephant of Westchester's REAL REVIEWS!

customer_reviews.title: A toy that lasts
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these things. She’s had them for a few months now and they don’t seem to get old. She’s only 8 months, so they are primarily valuable for chewing, stacking and looking at, but of course in the future she’ll appreciate them for the animals and numbers on their sides. My only complaint is that the cardboard box that holds them straight in the container (which is very useful, and nice to look at) disintegrates after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: falouette

customer_reviews.title: Third kid, best blocks!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are awesome! Soft enough to be thrown by a baby and not worry about black eyes, but still firm enough to stack entire package as single, seamless tower. Easy to hold for little hands, GREAT colors, and they squeak when squeezed. Each side has little edge that makes it easy to hold the block between your teeth. Don't ask me how I know. Best restyling of a classic toy that I've seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysJennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twin nieces two christmases ago and they still love it at 21 months. They like to stack the blocks and knock them over now that their hands are bigger than when they were smaller. It's a nice plus that they are soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bright, well made, great details....fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 month old grandson. It took him a few weeks to get used to the cube design, all of his toys were round or rounded before that, but he still liked the bright colors and got excited when he saw them. Now at six months he can pick them up and loves to teethe on them. He is starting to like it when we stack them. They are really well made and the details are awesome. I anticipate many years of playing with these!
customer_reviews.author: Heather N. Voss

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Got these when they were on sale. My baby loves to stack toilet paper rolls so I figured he’d like these blocks. These are GREAT! He loves to stack them, bang them together to make them squeak, gnaw on them, hand them to me, make me stack them, etc etc. they come in a very convient bag that he loves to carry around to tell me he wants to play (he’s 15 mo and not talking yet) . He likes to put them back in the bag and take them back out also. All around a great toy and thinking of getting another bag for the car!
customer_reviews.author: Lindo

customer_reviews.title: Safe fun!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time picking out blocks for my baby. She is 6 mitnhs old and I wanted something soft, big enough for her to grab, and colorful. I really like the colors and pictures on the blocks. She will eventually be able to practice counting and identifying animals in them when older. They have no smell and are soft enough that if she flings them & hits herself, it doesn't hurt. I am very pleased with the blocks. They came with a nice bag to store them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Becker

customer_reviews.title: Stack with me
customer_reviews.text: My infant daughter loves chewing on and playing with these blocks. They make a squeaky sound when you squeeze them. They are great for stacking, and I love the different designs on them. It's great that one side has the number and another side has the same number of objects on it. I wish that the bag was meant to just hold the 10 blocks like others have mentioned because when the blocks are stored in the bag, it looks like two are missing. Great product. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got 8 blocks and another random block that didnt even come with the bag and the bag was open. It was as if someone returned these and added another old block. Completely upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy
customer_reviews.text: My little guy likes these and as he gets older I expect him to like them even more. I love that they’re soft and squishy. They’re a decent size and can easily stack. I wish for the price there were 12 blocks instead of 10. He doesn’t use them as a teether so I cannot comment on that. They do squeak which is nice butttttt my dog thinks they’re his toy!!! Greet colors and pictures on the block. Will definitely be played with for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tigers

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite toys to accidentally step on
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even realize that they were squishy when i ordered them, but I’m so happy they are. This is one of the few toys that my son has that don’t kill me when I step on them. I’ve even let him use them in the bath because the are silicone and float. Super age appropriate for an 18 month old who is mastering the art of stacking. Because the have a relieve design on the surface, it makes it a little harder to stack if they aren’t centered exactly, this has made it much more interesting for my son. He’s also very fascinated with the numbers on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great first block set - fun to chew, squeak, build, and learn colors/numbers/animals!
customer_reviews.text: Love this block set! The blocks are soft enough to chew/gnaw on, but sturdy enough to actually build with them. My daughter also really enjoys the squeak sound that they make. The set comes with 10 blocks, numbered 1-10, and each one is adorned with animal(s) in the amount of the number of the block. (1 has 1 snake, 2 has 2 lions, etc). In addition to entertaining our 8 month old daughter, they also have provided entertainment to kids ages 4-5. The carrying case is a nice bonus, too. It's not the best quality, but it is useful to pack them up and take them on the go.
customer_reviews.author: JAMick34

customer_reviews.title: Easy for little ones to hold and eventually stack
customer_reviews.text: Easy for little ones to hold and eventually stack. Not hurtful or loud if thrown or knocked down. No worries if little one puts it in his mouth. Note: there are only 10 blocks. The middle section of the packaging, where two cubes would have fit, is just cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Nice blocks
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving these blocks 4 stars because some of the colors are a bit muted.I wish the blocks were more vibrant in color.Three of the blocks are 3 different shades of orange.Overall they are nice blocks and my daughter likes chewing them and tossing them around.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my niece (11 months old) and she loves them! Somehow, she didn't already have any blocks and I'm thrilled to have gotten her the first set. I already love the B. Toys brand and these blocks don't disappoint. They're lightweight and easy to clean, easy for her little hands to grab. I plan on buying her their set of architectural blocks next for her first birthday. Love them, and my sister says the baby is very happy with them too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic rubber blocks for 8 month old
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great, they have a slight sweet scent to them which I find appealing as compared to other Rubber products that smell kind of chemically. These are soft feeling squishy and squeak when squeezed. My 8 month old loves knocking them down as I build them. He will stop in his tracks and race across the room in order to knock down a newly-built tower and giggles the whole time. As he gets older and I'm sure he will love to build with them. I plan to incorporate wooden blocks along with these when he is not so keen on biting and chewing everything in existence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: A top toy in my book - we purchased these when our son was less than one year old. He's for now and we have a one and a half year old daughter. We use these blocks everyday consistently and they're still in perfect condition. No hesitations or concerns. They're a favorite toy for sure! I have long considered buying a couple more sets and we also have the alphabet set.
customer_reviews.author: chercherie

customer_reviews.title: What Could be Cuter?
customer_reviews.text: Only my granddaughter. I enjoy her company two days a week and am very picky about the toys she gets to play with at my house. F-P is always a good choice for quality, durability and educational quality. One of the toys she plays with is her father's F-P busy box, still going strong after 37 years. Likewise, she enjoying these and I hope her future child will too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F

customer_reviews.title: Great learning blocks
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can clean these blocks! The only bummer was one of them just ripped apart one day. They have a picture of an animal on each as well as a number which I think is great! They stack well and are soft enough to be bounced, chewed on and thrown around. The ridges around the numbers and animals on the blocks are a little difficult to rinse when cleaning, but other than that they work great!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great starting blocks
customer_reviews.text: Love these and so does my toddler! They're great for stacking and if baby is still teething and putting everything in their mouth. I love that they're numbered too so they will eventually teach numbers as well :) my daughter likes that they squeak and are the perfect size for small hands but not too small. I chose these over another brand that sold similar blocks because this one has two more :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to gift
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought three sets when my own kids were babies and they STILL use them at 4 and 5 years old (and look good as new!) I recently bought another set for my 6 month old nephew. It’s my go-to present for babies. They’re so well made. The texture and design is fun, and they withstand LOTS of play (and chewing).
customer_reviews.author: This Happy Homeschool

customer_reviews.title: Get Them
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 6 month old. He was able to pick them up and chomp on them. Helps his little swollen teething gums. They are easy to put away and are awesome quality. He likes that they squeak a little. These will last a long time and have a nice softness to them. Get them! I would buy these as a shower gift in a heartbeat. They present nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DrM@

customer_reviews.title: Cute product, hope son will enjoy at a later age
customer_reviews.text: So far my son was not too thrilled about these cubes, he is 7 months old. I actually think it is very cute, each one has different textures and colors and it is small enough for him to hold. He chew on it very little so far. I hope he will enjoy better as he grows older. The package is quite nice, although I wish the middle part was all cubes instead of a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: Children learn so much through play!
customer_reviews.text: I once had a teacher who said children learn through play! Those words stuck with me and after the baby was born I ordered so many toys (developmentally appropriate of course!) My baby is only 5 months but she enjoys playing with these( supervised of course). I stack them in a pyramid shape and she tries her hardest to crawl over and knock them down! It motivates her to crawl so I love it. I purchased two sets. One to take with me if we go over friends or families houses. Also this seller has all their stuff packaged so cute. I think it makes a cute gift as well. Maybe throw it together and make a gift basket.
customer_reviews.author: fatima

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: After I got it, I washed it with water and dried it before I played with my son. The little guy likes it very much. He can bite it with his mouth when he grasps it. The material is very good. He is not afraid of bumping. It is very practical for children. He can also be taught how to build a high base or put it in a different shape. It's really great. I like this toy, too.
customer_reviews.author: young

customer_reviews.title: Squishy and fun block set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of blocks! Bright colors, fun and squishy and comes in a reusable zipper bag. We have tons of fun building and knocking down. This set is not only for building though. We can learn colors, numbers, explore textures and sounds. These blocks are really fun to get my older kids safely interacting with baby as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kalley

customer_reviews.title: Best baby toy
customer_reviews.text: This one of my 2 year olds favorite toys. They are so safe to stack high and when they tumble down they are soft and won't bonk him on the head or squish his toes. The colors are fun and they even squeak. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Heflin

customer_reviews.title: Well made set
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality blocks that will last. One of my 11 mos old's favorite things to do is build towers with us and he gets to knock them down. Qe add on other toys to the toqers like little cups and plastic balls and small toys of various shapes etc
customer_reviews.author: New mom 2016

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: This is the first building block for my 8 months old baby. Its nice quality and well packed. BUT, it is really not easy to wash. There is a little hole on the side and the water will be filled into the inside. Water is easy to fill but not easy to pour out. So it will be mold inside after a few months. Not the right toy for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Colors suck, everything else about them is good
customer_reviews.text: Straight to the point: The colors of these blocks suck. Not sure when the colors changed, but I bought these in December 2019 and I didn't get a green block. I got 3 varying orange-ish blocks, 3 varying purple-ish block, two different blue blocks, one yellow and one red. Not exactly ideal for teaching a baby their colors. Aside from that they are soft, durable, easy to clean and good for teething.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Soft and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft these blocks are. I got them as a Christmas gift for my son last year and both him and his older brother like to play with them still from time to time. They are high quality and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lafaz83

customer_reviews.title: Quiet blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Blocks. Ever. I love these blocks. My son can stack them and knock them down on the wood floor without me having to worry about noise or scratches on the floor. He can toss them, bang them, or even fall on them and not hurt himself or anyone else. They are colorful and make a low squeaking noise when squeezed. He loves them and we parents love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Kopp

customer_reviews.title: My go-to gift for babies
customer_reviews.text: Well made with lots of thought into multiple uses. Each block has a number, that number of same type of different shapes on one side, and that number of different type of animal around the block. Soft for little hands and your feet when you accidentally step on one.
customer_reviews.author: TheatreCookie

customer_reviews.title: Its a 10 all they way!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when I first saw these, but I was wrong. My grandson loves these! They're soft enough for him to chew, and we've created a fun game where I stack them and he knocks them down and then belly laughs. There's a small hole in one side that has a slight whistle when squeezed which makes him laugh too. Even the bag is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these blocks. Mostly to chew on since he's teething. I would habe given 5 stars, but 1 broke. I dont know hoe my 4 month old managed to break it, or if it came that way and i didnt realize it. But yeah, one square the runner is torn open so i threw it away (recycled it) no biggie, i still would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Hammac

customer_reviews.title: Great and less apt to hurt when your toddler inevitably hurls them at you! :)
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to have these possibly thrown directly at your head multiple times in their lifetime, but they're fun and great despite being excellent projectiles. The packaging is a little odd since that middle bit in the pictures is just paper, so they never really go in so orderly after opening. They still keep their shape and stack well, and, as mentioned before, they're light and soft so they don't hurt when tossed about.
customer_reviews.author: Mee

customer_reviews.title: Good cubes
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old loves chewing on these cubes and makes squeaky sounds with it. Easily stackable and durable. Cute little pictures which help teach kids numbers and animals. He likes to knock them down after we stack for him. Definitely softer than the blocks and will not hurt babies.
customer_reviews.author: hbn45

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift for 7 month old.
customer_reviews.text: Had these years ago with our daughter but lost them/gave them away. Repurchased for our son and now both kids play with them. They’re great for the baby to play with without hurting him but the 3.5 year enjoys them as well. They’re soft and squishy but also firm - kind of bouncy. Was a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Bailey

customer_reviews.title: These are dog toys
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a nice quiet toy for my 1 year old niece. These squeak like dog toys. Seriously? Nope. Returning immediately. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but What's wrong with two rows of 5?
customer_reviews.text: Great soft blocks. The complaint I have is the bag they come in has room for two more blocks, however manufacturer decided to use cardboard to fill the space. The travel bag is kinda silly when there should be 2 more blocks or 2 rows of 5 because there are 10 blocks. Bag looks silly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Colors Don't Match Photos
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and from a playing perspective, they're great, my 10 month old likes them and I look forward to using them to teach colors, numbers, animals, etc. as she gets older. But the colors don't match the photos. There is no green block, the number one block is actually yellow, not green as pictured, and then there are 3 shades of orange blocks, but no green, which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little Blocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Loveeee! Just Got These Today! Came In A Cute Reusable Pouch Pocket. Very Soft But Hard At The Same Time... lol O Cant Explain It But I Loveeeee! The Textured Animals And Numbers Are Super Dope Too! I Am Steaming Them Now. Mommy Loves Them! We Will Soon See If Baby Loves Them Too!!! If You Dont See An Update That Means He Loved Them!!
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ageless toy for every child!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! The cubes are soft, chewing on them is a dream for my baby, stackable, visually pleasing and perfect when the little one is old enough to count. The colors are elegant and subtle, not a punch in your eyes like many others I saw. The bag that comes with the set is very cute and perfect to keep all the cubes in place. Plus it’s an ageless toy, cubes are always fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Markova

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 6 months old and she loves these things! They're the perfect size for her to get a good grip on them and they make a squeak sound when you squeeze them that she can't get enough of! Also pretty easy clean, i just use hot water with bottle soap and a bottle brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My babies don’t use them for teething so its hard to tell how good it is but just the size and squareness would make me wonder. But, these are excellent quality and usability. The rubber is sturdy but soft and my grandchildren love them
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, and educational!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several sets of these blocks 2 years ago. The grandkids love them. I bought more to add to the fun of stacking . They're very educational, as the number on the block corresponds to the number of animals pictured in 3D. I love the new pastel colors!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these! He's a year old and of all the toys, these are among his favorites. They are east go manipulate, sturdy but no hard edges. They stack, squeak a little, and are easy for him to handle and are even good in the bath. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: E.G. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 1yr old. I wish I didn’t wait so long!!! The price is great and he loves it! Perfect size for his hands. He loves “walking” around with them in his hands or mouth. He doesn’t like teething toys, but he always has one in his mouth!
customer_reviews.author: terri a.

customer_reviews.title: Grows with baby’s development
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely an amazing toy for my baby! She’s 7 months old and this is awesome. She teeth’s on it and loves to feel the textured sides. This toy can also “grow” with her when she’s ready for block building, colors, animals and numbers. She also loves to create the squeaking sound. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YitzyChavy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the play pen
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves knocking these over and they are heaven to chew on (at least I think he feels that way). He enjoys the squeaking too. The colors and designs are so fun and I really liked the little zip bag that it arrived in so we can easily pack them up. I also appreciate that they are quick and easy to clean. They’re a perfect addition to my little one’s play pen.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie.LBC

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these blocks, and he’s even a big fan of the container bag that they come in. The bag is durable enough to withstand my 9 month old’s curiosity and store the blocks in at the end of the day which makes storage and organization a breeze. The blocks themselves are soft enough for his little hands to make them squeak but durable enough for him to chew on as he’s teething. He also loves knocking over the towers we build with these blocks. I can see these growing with him and standing up to the abuse they see now and in the future.
customer_reviews.author: WisconsinGal

customer_reviews.title: Unclear colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice blocks, good quality and nice blocks overall. My daughter plays with them often. BUT the reason I'm giving this 3 stars, is the colors. She is learning colors, and she gets confused when she is naming the blocks. There is no green, but two "orange" and two "purple" blocks of different shades. These blocks are intended to be for the number, letter and color learners, and I wish there are more "clear" colors for the 1,5-2 year old ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish there were more
customer_reviews.text: I wish this came with more. They seem a little small and 10 isn't that many when my LO wants to play. I wish the little decorative box in the center wasn't there and there were blocks instead. Believe it or not, but 12 would make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bretta

customer_reviews.title: 8 month old loves them
customer_reviews.text: Love these blocks. Each has a different number on it and has that number of items on a different side. Cute colors, my son likes these. Mine didn’t come with a funky smell like other reviewers mentioned. Just don’t submerge in water (obviously..) because they do have a hole. We just clean with our toy cleaner (vinegar). We would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and so does my son! Super cute and soft and easy for him to grab. He’s 5 months old. Lots of good colors and I like that they make a little squeak. Easy to stack and easy to knock down too. They come in a nice case which I threw away but would be great as a gift in it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy and so does my baby
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy and so does my baby! The sides of each block have unique animals, shapes, colors, and numbers for optimal learning development. The also float for bath time fun. These are traditional blocks that have been elevated! And not to mention, they won't hurt if thrown by a toddler like traditional blocks would.
customer_reviews.author: bspence

customer_reviews.title: Really nice blocks!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old baby girl LOVES these blocks! She was mesmerized by them for hours when they first arrived. She likes to try to stack them, shake them, squeeze them , throw them and of course, mouth them! She also loves the squeaky noise they make. I was really surprised at the good quality of these blocks. The colors, texture and designs are great and the carrying case that they come in is adorable. They seem like something from a higher end boutique toy shop and like they would cost more than $10.00. Classy and classic! Highly recommend these blocks!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kolesar

customer_reviews.title: I personally loved these. Although
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved these. Although, my son, not so much. We've had them since he was very young, maybe 9/10 months, and even now, at 20 months, he doesn't play with them as much as I'd like. Although my mom did use them in the bathtub with him, and he really did enjoy them in there. I just didn't like how it was difficult to get all the water out of them each bath time, so I removed them from the bath. But, they're not made to be bath toys, so I cannot truly complain about their water retaining tendencies.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirlmethis

customer_reviews.title: Cute but ehh
customer_reviews.text: Bought because she’s 6 months and really thought she’d enjoy them now that she’s sitting up. Ehh, not really. They can’t stack them at this age and wrong shape for teething. I feel like I bought these more for myself because they are adorable and I had hoped she’s like. Maybe as she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Sala

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blocks! Baby has been playing with since 4 months, is 11 months now and stacks them, learning colors etc. Soft and if rolls on them won’t hurt her or if throws at dog walking by won’t hurt him..lol! Great buy and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Not for younger babies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 m/o and isn’t really that into these blocks. I’m going to try them again when she starts stacking things. What I really don’t like about them is that the squeaker is the same as a dog toy sound, so my dogs get really amped up when they hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Cute little blocks!
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned and sanitized them before giving them to baby (but did not submerge them in water). She loves her new blocks! She's 6 months old and learning to sit up on her own, so these are fun for her to play with while she sits!
customer_reviews.author: Candelina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small fingers to grip, stack, squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 7 month old granddaughter. Easy to grip, stack, and squeeze. She enjoys them. Light weight so no worries when she bangs them on her head or throws them. I highly recommend and would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Fritchle

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby!
customer_reviews.text: These.blocks remain one of my 14 month old favorite toys. They're easy to grip and stack and he loves to chew on them. The colors are fantastic and the details in then are really cute. I love these blocks as much as he does!
customer_reviews.author: L mor

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a little misleading...
customer_reviews.text: Product description says blocks float, so I assumed they would be a great bath toy. However, once received, instructions say blocks should ONLY be wiped with a damp cloth, not submerged in water. However, cute for regular play: each block’s number has a corresponding number of animals or objects around the block, makes a fun learning tool! Careful: some block’s plastic moldings around the numbers are jagged: I’m not sure bits wouldn’t tear off in child’s mouth, so maybe not best for teething purposes because I don’t know what material blocks are made of.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: My grandbabies love these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they're soft, and my twin grandbabies (18 mo) won't hurt each other when they decide to throw them. They stack them and knock them over repeatedly, and I don't have to worry about them scratching the table. They also chew on them occasionally, which is OK. As they grow we'll look at the educational pictures on the blocks!
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and steady
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loved them. They are light weight, but steady and what’s important they are soft. She hurt hurdled when stacking wood blocks and they have sharp edges and can hurt a baby when a tall stack falls. But these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and easy to clean! Baby loves it too. It makes squeaky noise when you squeeze them!
customer_reviews.author: Cylee

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks with case
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these blocks. They are great for my son who is teething and my older daughter likes to build with them and likes to look at the pictures and numbers and count with them. I like the carry case that comes with them!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought those after almost buying a more expensive option on a specialty site. I’m glad I got them although my 8 month old isn’t that into them yet. I love the detailing and seem like good quality. Wish they could go into bath like the more expensive option but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schuky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blocks for Baby!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are amazing! Beautiful colors, fun pictures of animals on each one, and best of all great for chewing! My son is just under a year old, and he has been playing with these for about 6 months. He loves the bright colors, and will just sit there chewing on them. He also loves to knock down towers built with these blocks, and pull them out of their storage bag. I love them because there are no sharp edges, so I don't have to worry about injuries. This is definitely one of our favorite toys!
customer_reviews.author: MGO158

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! These blocks are amazing! I have a 10-month-old who we are just now trying to teach him the concept of stacking blocks. These blocks make it so much easier! They have adorable designs on them, and they have a good grip. So, babies can stack them without really having to worry about getting the block right on top. It really helps them just to learn the concept and gets their fine motor skills working! This is one of my favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these blocks! He is still learning to control his arm movements and sometimes I worry because once he gets going his arms are everywhere. These blocks are soft enough that I don't have to worry about him accidentally hitting himself and getting hurt. He likes all the different colors and textures on the blocks. Will be used for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these blocks. They’re a softer/smoother plastic than my sons other blocks. He’s ten months old and loves to toss them around. The package was a lot smaller than I realized when it came in, but still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to baby drool and throwing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 month old. A month later and they’re still one of his favorite toys. I keep a few in the car, my diaper back and around the house. I love that they squeak!!! Totally helps with getting his attention when needed. Well worth the purchase !!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Great First Block Set
customer_reviews.text: Real cute first block set for my 9 month old granddaughter. Still at the knock em down phase but I can see that she is starting to experiment with them each day I bring them out. Very cute carrying case as well. Feel safe with the inevitable put in mouth to chew routine. We will work on the numbers and characters as she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie K

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Great for a first block, and it's nice for teething as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Kay

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old loved them!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my baby opened this toy he started stacking and playing with them. He likes to throw them hard and see them bounce since they’re rubbery... over all I don’t really see my one year old get too happy over a toy but he definitely likes these blocks
customer_reviews.author: StephanieSL93

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great for infants and toddlers. Soft, easy to grab and learn how to stack or move around. Keeps my 6 month old entertained and i can see the wheels turning in her head as she plays with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves these! Good for the teething stage and beyond. My boy is 13months and still loves to stack these and toss them around. I do wish that they didn’t have the air hole on one side of them. Over time if any moisture gets inside (which is bound to happen if they’re chewed on) then you inevitably get mildew/mold buildup and then they have to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: s. williams

customer_reviews.title: SAME day delivery!  Good price and stacking block toy for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Expedited delivery (SAME day delivered 2-hours before estimated delivery time!). Great packaging; got exactly what was ordered! Will await for more inventory and will order again! Great price! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: K3n/a

customer_reviews.title: rubber strands coming off two blocks
customer_reviews.text: I got amazon delivered these yesterday 10 Soft & Colorful Stacking Blocks:  The blocks have rubber strands coming off two blocks. This is a sign of poor finishing and quality control. These inappropriately finished blacks are advertised as "chewable" . I'm not sure how to fix it, as I'm not good with cutting/finishing. The toddlers can easy chew and swallow on them. I hope the manufacturer can correct this and do more quality checks.
customer_reviews.author: Minimalist

product_meta.title: B. toys – One Two Squeeze Baby Blocks - Building Blocks for Toddlers – Educational Baby Toys 6 Months & Up with Numbers, Shapes, Animals & Textures – 10 Soft & Colorful Stacking Blocks
product_meta.description:
The b. One two squeeze building blocks provide hours of fun and many developmental assets for your baby or toddler. Not only will they love stacking them up and knocking them back down (this is the best part!), they'll also love to learn about the different animals, Colors, and numbers on each side. Stackable, chewable, squeakable and squeezable. The one two squeeze blocks are above all lovable! Every block is hand-sculpted and completely non-toxic. Ten blocks and 60 sides for one You!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ten 1-to-10 blocks for one you.
feature_bullets: A true classic baby toy; Super soft blocks for toddlers and babies with beautiful colors.
10 hand-sculpted toy blocks. Stack them up, up, up. All the way to the top.
Squeezy, squeaky; Chewable blocks, perfect for Lil’ nibblers.
Beautiful reusable bag; 100% recycled fabric, put it all away at the end of the day.
Encourage early learning. Teaching colors, numbers, hand-eye coordination and more.
Trustworthy; Battat is a family-owned company that has been established in 1897.
B. Powerful We. Org receives a portion of sales from every B. Toy purchased.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
